citation: Proclamation under the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) Act 2020 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) Act 2020

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Commercial Leases) Act 2020 fix 3 June 2020 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, apart from section 17, commence.

1 June 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Building and Construction

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 June 2020

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
